modName: Liliths Carver - Custom Sword and Greatsword
summary:
This mod is a complete remake of Lilith\'s Razor. 
Now includes a Greatsword version as well with a working sheath.
descriptionHtml:
Got problems or would like to have something changed? Make a comment! All feedback is very welcome!

[color=red]The optional files might not work with the 3.0 so use 2.2 found in the old files.[/color]

Lilith\'s Carver - Custom Sword and Greatsword
----------------------------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22903][img]http://users.metropolia.fi/~tommiw/crap/nikibanner.jpg[/img][/url]
(Click to get to the mod\'s page!)
3.0 update:
----------------
- Adds an new version of the weapons into the game called Lilith\'s Ancient Carver that has darker textures and glowing edges. These weapons have slightly higher attack than the normal ones. You will need to upgrade the basic version with of the weapon with 5 daedra hearts to get the ancient version

- Lilith\'s Cutter removed from the mod and crafting requirements

- description removed -> enchantment info can be seen

- Adds 2 smaller 2-handers (can be made ancient)

- Vampire dust removed from crafting ingredients

2.2 update:
---------------
The bloodmesh on all the weapons have been improved. Blood shows a lot more now than before.

2.1 Update:
--------------

- Smaller 1-handed carver

- Sheathless 2-h version added

- slimmer handle


2.0 with fix:
--------------
- The bigger 1-hander was not temperable. it\'s now fixed.

2.0 Update:
--------------

- Added a bigger one-handed carver. Named as Lilith\'s Carver (B). Has same stats and crafting cost as the normal one.

- Added a 2-handed greatsword version of the sword with a working sheath. 
   Stats: weight: 17 atk.spd: 1.0 Dam: 22. Has elevated crit damage as well. 

Description:
- - - - - - - -

[youtube]cjsaE6B_s6c[/youtube] [youtube]8FMuqO5TPn8#![/youtube]

[youtube]yiVmzjvSRdc[/youtube]

.....................................................................................................................................
This weapon is part of a Weapon set \"Lilith\'s Tools\"
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Lilith\'s Disemboweler - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14906]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Decapitator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13416]LInk[/url]

Lilith\'s Reaver -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15969]Link[/url]\'

Lilith\'s Sickle - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22368]Link[/url]

Lilith\'s Carver - This mod

Lilith\'s Obliterator - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23733]Link[/url]

(Lilith\'s Razor - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11908]Link[/url])

(Lilith\'s Cleavers - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12458]Link[/url])

More weapons coming up including dagger and more! Even maybe an armor set when the stars are aligned!
......................................................................................................................................

This is a complete remake of my first Skyrim weapon mod Lilith\'s Razor. The reason for this remake is quite obvious. It looks bad. At least compared to the newer ones. However, for \"nostalgy reasons\" I included the good ol\' razor as well this time named as \"Lilith\'s Cutter\" that works as an ingredient for the remake itself (Orcish smithing). And no, I will not make the cutter look any better :P

Thanks to the Carver\'s light weight, slim shape etc. it has high attack speed but lacks power though crit damage is increased (which unfortunately doesn\'t scale with weapons normal damage).

Stats:

Carver vs daedric sword

dam: 12 / 14

Crit damage: 

atk.spd: 1.3/ 1.0


Crafting ingredients : 3 Vampire dusts, 5 Daedra Hearts, 5 Ebony Ingots, 10 leather Strips and Lilith\'s Cutter

Crafting ingredients for cutter: 1 daedra heart, 1 vampire dust, 5 steel ingots, 6 leather strips

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Installion manually:
- - - - - -

1.Just dump everything inside the Data folder to  C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data , Merge if asked

2. Check the lilithscarver1_0.esp in the launcher 

3. You\'re ready to go :)
 



Uninstallion:
- - - - - - - - -

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
